TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextComposition extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject

Docs.summary: Represents a composition related to text input which includes the composition text itself, any related control or system text, and a state of completion for the composition.

MemberSignature.Value: public TextComposition (System.Windows.Input.InputManager inputManager, System.Windows.IInputElement source, string resultText);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Input.InputManager inputManager, class System.Windows.IInputElement source, string resultText) cil managed

Docs.param: An input manager to associate with this text composition.
A source element for this text composition. The object underlying the source element must implement the interface.
A string containing the initial text for the composition. This parameter will become the value of the property in the new class instance.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, taking a specified , source element, and composition text as initial values for the new instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If this constructor is used to create a new instance of <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition>, the new instance will have <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition.AutoComplete%2A> set to **On**.

MemberSignature.Value: public TextComposition (System.Windows.Input.InputManager inputManager, System.Windows.IInputElement source, string resultText, System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionAutoComplete autoComplete);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Input.InputManager inputManager, class System.Windows.IInputElement source, string resultText, valuetype System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionAutoComplete autoComplete) cil managed

Docs.param: An input manager to associate with this text composition.
A source element for this text composition. The object underlying the source element must implement the interface.
A string containing the initial text for the composition. This parameter will become the value of the property in the new class instance.
A member of the enumerations specifying desired auto-complete behavior for this text composition.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, taking a specified , source element, composition text, and a setting as initial values for the new instance.
Gets the auto-complete setting for this text composition.
Docs.value: A member of the enumerations specifying the current auto-complete behavior for this text composition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Complete() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method calls the static <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.CompleteComposition%2A> method with this text composition as the input parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public string CompositionText { get; protected set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the composition text for this text composition.
Docs.value: A string containing the composition text for this text composition.

MemberSignature.Value: public string ControlText { get; protected set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets any control text associated with this text composition.
Docs.value: A string containing any control text associated with this text composition.

MemberSignature.Value: public string SystemCompositionText { get; protected set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the system composition text for this text composition.
Docs.value: A string containing the system composition text for this text composition.

MemberSignature.Value: public string SystemText { get; protected set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the system text for this text composition.
Docs.value: A string containing the system text for this text composition.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Text { get; protected set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the current text for this text composition.
Docs.value: A string containing the current text for this text composition.
